divs: sighting detailsi opened my back door and i seen a bright huge light raying upwards..i ran and got my boyfriend who was sleeping. we both examed it for a while then i got my camera i took some pictures, the light would not show up but there are some things you can see. i also took a video. my son started crying as soon as i went to get him my boyfriend said it shut off..i wanted to catch it on film but he said it turned off light a tv screen. today 6\16\08 i went out to the feild with my mom and sisters and aunts to see if it left anything and there is circles of grass lieing down in the feild. so many days have past it is popping back up but u can still see the circles. id rather talk to someone before i give photos..
